pullRequest.title: Fix SPMigration after dry run if channel is cloned (bsc#1176307)
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
When scheduling an sp migration after a dry run through
Events -> History -> Select successful dry run -> Click run migration
an ISE was thrown if the channel is a cloned channel.
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: Bugfix


 DONE


Test coverage


No tests: Bugfix


 DONE


Links
Fixes SUSE/spacewalk#12389

 DONE

Changelogs
If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)
Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
 Re-run test "backend_unittests_pgsql"
 Re-run test "java_lint_checkstyle"
 Re-run test "java_pgsql_tests"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_oracle"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_pgsql"
 Re-run test "susemanager_unittests"
 Re-run test "javascript_lint"
 Re-run test "spacecmd_unittests"

beforeCommit.message:
Fix SPMigration after dry run if channel is cloned

When scheduling an sp migration after a dry run through
Events -> History -> Select successful dry run -> Click run migration
an ISE was thrown if the channel is a cloned channel.

Signed-off-by: Pascal Arlt <parlt@suse.com>

afterCommit.message:
Fix SPMigration after dry run if channel is cloned (bsc#1176307)

When scheduling an sp migration after a dry run through
Events -> History -> Select successful dry run -> Click run migration
an ISE was thrown if the channel is a cloned channel.

Signed-off-by: Pascal Arlt <parlt@suse.com>

nodes.bodyText:
I think we might need to do some recursive lookup here, as the original can also be a clone 😄
(You can test, that it fails using 2 environments in the CLM project we discussed).
Maybe there is even some helper method somewhere in the code, I'll try to check that.
